titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit early distributions from employee stock ownership plans for higher education expenses and first-time homebuyer purchases.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/8/1999--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit, without payment of the ten-percent additional tax on early distributions from qualified retirement plans and under specified conditions, early distributions from employee stock ownership plans for qualified higher education expenses and qualified first-time homebuyer purchases.
